channel.title: mistersugar tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from mistersugar.

item.description: Thank you @AmericanU and unions for resolving the strike. Move-in day was not what we wished for. I'm glad my daughter and her classmates now can enjoy their first days on campus and begin to focus on learning. https://t.co/oIVPrEDEwv
item.source:markdown: Thank you @AmericanU and unions for resolving the strike. Move-in day was not what we wished for. I'm glad my daughter and her classmates now can enjoy their first days on campus and begin to focus on learning. https://t.co/oIVPrEDEwv

item.description: I took Malia to the Carrboro post office to apply for a new passport. As opposed to our last experience, this was smooth as possible, and we were in an out in 15 minutes. Tomorrow is Oliver's turn.
item.source:markdown: I took Malia to the Carrboro post office to apply for a new passport. As opposed to our last experience, this was smooth as possible, and we were in an out in 15 minutes. Tomorrow is Oliver's turn.

item.description: Join us in the DCRI Research Communications & Engagement department - position open, great team, interesting & meaningful work, generous benefits: CLINICAL RESEARCH COMM SPECIALIST III, https://t.co/Q3wHTdd9OU
